locations: Ashland, Oregon, USA::(Rogue Valley Community Television)
imdb.plot outline: Host John Letz talks to David "Glamour Dave" Nienow about the Life Art Gallery and Cultural Center in Medford, Oregon. The work the gallery does to help at risk teens in Southern Oregon and the cross collaboration of RVTV shows created to help promote and talk about the different aspects of the gallery and their outreach efforts to Southern Oregon teens.
imdb.title: Adventures in Education: Life Art Gallery
akas: Adventures in Education: Life Art Gallery (United States)
plot: Host John Letz talks to David "Glamour Dave" Nienow about the Life Art Gallery and Cultural Center in Medford, Oregon. The work the gallery does to help at risk teens in Southern Oregon and the cross collaboration of RVTV shows created to help promote and talk about the different aspects of the gallery and their outreach efforts to Southern Oregon teens.
